page.title: 15Religion In East Huntspill
page.content: The village church is called All Saint's which means the same as All Hallow's,the church of West Huntspill.Both are of the Church of England religion.The Vicar performs Weddings,Christenings and Funerals as well as the usual Sunday Church services.Weddings and funerals but not christenings have to be paid for.In the graveyard there are about 200 graves.There are also 24 Lime trees and a few cherry trees.The Vicar has been at the church for two years.The average congregation is about 35.Since last year the number of people going to church has risen. There is also a Methodist Chapel in the village.Their services take place at 11.00 on Sundays.The Minister is based in Bridgwater.He,like the Vicar, serves more than one area.
